channel.title: Megalovania Remix 2.0 B.O.S.S. - BobTheGUYYYYY [Electro, House, Remix]
channel.description:
Back at it again with another track! This time I revisited an oldie. Go ahead and listen to the original if you want to hear something really bad. ðŸ˜…
Anyways, hereâ€™s the 2.0 Remix!
[![yeetsen%20(1)|500x500](upload://5GaSSOC9lqhxzbl4L1DDefvW6id.png)](https://soundcloud.com/bobtheguyyyyy/megalovania-remix-2-0-b-o-s-s)
If youâ€™re wondering what the B.O.S.S. Is there for, it actually stands for Because Osharu Said So. I only did this remix because @Osharu suggested it in my VG Remix idea thread, so props to him!
Hope you guys dig it. Peace out!
